Acid.desc: 10 chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

Acid Armor.desc: Boosts the user's Defense by two stages.

Acid Downpour.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Acid Spray.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.

Acrobatics.desc: Base Power doubles if the user has no held item.

Acupressure.desc: Boosts a random stat by two stages.

After You.desc: If the target has not yet moved, it will attack immediately after the user.

Agility.desc: Boosts the user's Speed by two stages.

Air Slash.desc: 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

All-Out Pummeling.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Ally Switch.desc: Switches the user's position with that of an ally. Priority +2.

Amnesia.desc: Boosts the user's Special Defense by two stages.

Anchor Shot.desc: Prevents the target from switching out.

Ancient Power.desc: 10 chance to boost all stats by one stage.

Aqua Ring.desc: User recovers 1/16th of max HP each turn.

Aromatherapy.desc: Cures status on the user's team.

Aromatic Mist.desc: The user raises its and its allies' Special Defense by one stage.

Assist.desc: Uses a random move from the user's team.

Assurance.desc: Base Power doubles if the target takes damage in the same turn before this move is used.

Astonish.desc: 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Attract.desc: Targets of the opposite gender are infatuated and have a 50 chance to do nothing.

Aurora Beam.desc: 10 chance to lower the opposing Pokemon's Attack by one stage.

Aurora Veil.desc: For 5 turns, damage to allies is halved. Hail only.

Autotomize.desc: Boosts the user's Speed by two stages. Reduces the user's weight by 220 lbs (100 kg).

Avalanche.desc: Base Power doubles if the user was damaged by the target previously in the same turn. Priority -4.

Baby-Doll Eyes.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage. Priority +1.

Barrier.desc: Boosts the user's Defense by two stages.

Baton Pass.desc: The user switches, passing on all stat changes and some special conditions.

Beak Blast.desc: Burns on contact with the user before it moves.

Beat Up.desc: All healthy Pokemon on the user's team aid in damaging the target.

Belch.desc: The user must have eaten a Berry to use this move.

Belly Drum.desc: The user loses 50 of max HP. Maximizes the user's Attack.

Bestow.desc: The user passes its held item to the target.

Bide.desc: Charges for two turns; returns double the damage received in those turns. Priority +1.

Bind.desc: Deals damage to the target at the end of every turn for 4-5 turns.

Bite.desc: 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Black Hole Eclipse.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Blaze Kick.desc: High critical hit rate. 10 chance to burn the target.

Bloom Doom.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Bone Club.desc: 10 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Bounce.desc: The user is made invulnerable for one turn, then hits the next turn. 30 chance to paralyze the target.

Brave Bird.desc: User takes one-third of damage dealt in recoil.

Breakneck Blitz.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Brick Break.desc: Destroys Light Screen and Reflect, then hits.

Brine.desc: Base Power doubles if the target's HP is 50 or less.

Brutal Swing.desc: No additional effect. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

Bubble.desc: 10 chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

Bubble Beam.desc: 10 chance to lower the target's Speed by one stage.

Bug Bite.desc: Takes and uses the target's Berry.

Bug Buzz.desc: 10 chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Bulk Up.desc: Boosts the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.

Bulldoze.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.

Burn Up.desc: User's Fire-type is removed until it switches out.

Calm Mind.desc: Boosts the user's Special Attack and Special Defense by one stage.

Camouflage.desc: Changes the user's type to Normal in Link Battles.

Captivate.desc: Lowers a target of the opposite gender's Special Attack by two stages.

Charge.desc: Doubles power of an Electric-type move used next turn and raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.

Charge Beam.desc: 70 chance to boost the user's Special Attack by one stage.

Charm.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

Circle Throw.desc: Forces the target to switch out and to a random Pokemon. Priority -6.

Clamp.desc: Deals damage to the target at the end of every turn for 4-5 turns.

Clangorous Soulblaze.desc: Boosts all stats by one stage. Hits adjacent foes.

Close Combat.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

Coil.desc: Boosts the user's Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.

Confide.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

Constrict.desc: 10 chance to lower the target Speed by one stage.

Continental Crush.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Conversion.desc: Changes the user into the type of the move in its first moveslot.

Conversion 2.desc: Changes the user into a new type that resists the last attack to hit it.

Copycat.desc: Uses the last move used in the battle.

Core Enforcer.desc: Nullifies the foe(s) Ability if the target moves first.

Corkscrew Crash.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Cosmic Power.desc: Boosts the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

Cotton Guard.desc: Boosts the user's Defense by three stages.

Cotton Spore.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.

Counter.desc: If hit by a physical attack, deals double the damage taken.

Crafty Shield.desc: Protects the user and allies from status moves. Priority +3.

Cross Poison.desc: High critical hit rate. 10 chance to poison the target.

Crunch.desc: 20 chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

Crush Claw.desc: 50 chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

Crush Grip.desc: Base Power depends on the target's remaining HP.

Curse.desc: Does 1/4 of max HP damage per turn at the cost of half the user's max HP if the user is a Ghost-type. Boosts the user's Attack and Defense and lowers Speed by one stage each otherwise.

Dark Pulse.desc: 20 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Dark Void.desc: Puts the target to sleep. Fails unless used by Darkrai.

Darkest Lariat.desc: Ignores the target's stat stage changes.

Dazzling Gleam.desc: Deals damage to all adjacent foes.

Defend Order.desc: Boosts the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

Defense Curl.desc: Boosts the user's Defense by one stage.

Defog.desc: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage. Removes various field effects.

Destiny Bond.desc: If the user faints before using its next move, the attacker faints.

Detect.desc: Prevents anything from working on the user that turn. Priority +4.

Devastating Drake.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Diamond Storm.desc: 50 chance to boost the user's Defense by two stages.

Dig.desc: User is made invulnerable for one turn, then hits the next turn.

Disable.desc: Prevents the last move used by the target from being used again for 4 turns.

Dive.desc: User is made invulnerable for one turn, then hits the next turn.

Doom Desire.desc: Deals damage at the end of the turn after three turns.

Double Team.desc: Boosts the user's evasion by one stage.

Double-Edge.desc: User takes one-third of damage dealt in recoil.

Draco Meteor.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.

Dragon Ascent.desc: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

Dragon Dance.desc: Boosts the user's Attack and Speed by one stage each.

Dragon Rush.desc: 20 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Dragon Tail.desc: Forces the target to switch to a random Pokemon. Priority -6.

Dream Eater.desc: Leeches 50 of the damage dealt. Only works if the target is asleep.

Earth Power.desc: 10 chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Earthquake.desc: Base Power doubles against Pokemon using Dig.

Echoed Voice.desc: Power increases when used consecutively by any ally.

Eerie Impulse.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.

Electric Terrain.desc: For five turns, grounded Pokemon cannot fall asleep and will be woken up if already sleeping. Their Electric-type moves are powered up by 50.

Electrify.desc: Changes the type of the target's move to Electric if the user moves before the target.

Electro Ball.desc: Inflicts more damage the faster the user is compared to the target.

Electroweb.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.

Embargo.desc: Item use is prevented for five turns.

Encore.desc: Forces the target to repeat the last move it used for three turns.

Endeavor.desc: Lowers the target's HP to the user's HP.

Endure.desc: The user survives with at least 1 HP. The chance of failure increases if it, Detect, Protect, Wide Guard, Quick Guard, King's Shield, or Spiky Shield was used successfully the previous turn. Priority +3.

Energy Ball.desc: 10 chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Entrainment.desc: Changes the target's ability to that of the user.

Eruption.desc: Does less damage as the user's HP decreases.

Extrasensory.desc: 10 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Extreme Evoboost.desc: Raises user's Atk, Def, SpA, SpD, and Spe by 2.

Facade.desc: Base Power doubles if the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

Fairy Lock.desc: All Pokemon cannot flee the next turn.

Fairy Wind.desc: Deals damage to one adjacent target.

Fake Out.desc: Always causes the target to flinch. Can only be used on the user's first turn out. Priority +3.

Fake Tears.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.

False Swipe.desc: The target survives with at least 1 HP.

Feather Dance.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

Feint.desc: Nullifies the effects of the target's Detect, Wide Guard, Quick Guard, Spiky Shield, King's Shield, and Protect for the rest of the turn. User does not suffer the adverse affects of Spiky Shield and King's Shield. Priority +2.

Fell Stinger.desc: User's Attack stat increases by three stages if it KOes the target in the same turn.

Fiery Dance.desc: 50 chance to boost the user's Special Attack by one stage.

Final Gambit.desc: Causes the user to faint. Target takes damage equal to the user's HP at the time of use.

Fire Fang.desc: 10 chance of causing the target to flinch. 10 chance to burn the target.

Fire Lash.desc: 100 chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Fire Pledge.desc: Use with Grass Pledge or Water Pledge for additional effect.

Fire Spin.desc: Deals damage to the target at the end of every turn for 4-5 turns.

Flail.desc: Does more damage as the user's HP decreases.

Flame Burst.desc: Damages Pokemon next to the target as well.

Flame Charge.desc: Boosts the user's Speed by one stage.

Flame Wheel.desc: 10 chance to burn the target. Thaws the user.

Flare Blitz.desc: User takes one-third of damage dealt in recoil. 10 chance to burn the target.

Flash.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

Flash Cannon.desc: 10 chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Flatter.desc: Confuses the target and boosts its Special Attack by one stage.

Fleur Cannon.desc: Lowers the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

Fling.desc: Throws the user's item at the target. Base Power and effect depend on the item.

Floral Healing.desc: Heals the target by 50 of its max HP.

Flower Shield.desc: Raises the Defense of all Grass-types on the field by one stage.

Fly.desc: User is made invulnerable for one turn, then hits the next turn.

Focus Blast.desc: 10 chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Focus Energy.desc: Boosts the user's critical hit rate by two stages.

Focus Punch.desc: Fails if the user takes damage in the same turn before moving. Priority -3.

Follow Me.desc: All moves used by foes subsequently in the turn target the user. Priority +2.

Foresight.desc: Nullifies evasion modifiers. Allows Fighting- and Normal-type moves to hit Ghost-types.

Forest's Curse.desc: Adds Grass to the target's type(s). If the target already has three types, the third is replaced.

Foul Play.desc: Uses the target's Attack stat in damage calculation.

Freeze Shock.desc: Hits the turn after being used. 30 chance to paralyze the target.

Freeze-Dry.desc: Super effective against Water-type Pokemon. 10 chance to freeze the target.

Frost Breath.desc: Always results in a critical hit.

Frustration.desc: Base Power decreases proportionally to the user's happiness.

Fury Cutter.desc: Power doubles with each consecutive use.

Fusion Bolt.desc: Base Power doubles if used immediately after Fusion Flare or Blue Flare.

Fusion Flare.desc: Base Power doubles if used immediately after Fusion Bolt or Bolt Strike.

Future Sight.desc: Deals damage at the end of the turn after three turns.

Gear Up.desc: Raises Atk, Sp. Atk of allies with Plus/Minus by 1.

Geomancy.desc: Charges for one turn, then raises Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages each the next turn.

Gigavolt Havoc.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Glaciate.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.

Grass Knot.desc: Deals damage based on the target's weight.

Grass Pledge.desc: Use with Fire Pledge or Water Pledge for additional effect.

Grassy Terrain.desc: For five turns, grounded Pokemon restore 1/16 of their HP each turn. Their Grass-type moves are boosted by 50.

Gravity.desc: For 5 turns, prevents flying or jumping; also disables immunities to Ground.

Growl.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage.

Growth.desc: Boosts the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each. Boosts the user's Attack and Special Attack by two stages each in bright sunlight.

Grudge.desc: If the user faints, the attack that KOed it loses all of its PP.

Guard Split.desc: Averages the user's Defense and Special Defense stats with the target's, ignoring stat changes.

Guard Swap.desc: Swaps the user's stat changes of Defense with those of Special Defense.

Guardian of Alola.desc: Does damage equal to 3/4 target's current HP.

Gust.desc: Base Power doubles if the target is using Fly.

Gyro Ball.desc: Deals damage based on how slow the user is compared to the target.

Hammer Arm.desc: Lowers the user's Speed by one stage.

Happy Hour.desc: No competitive effect. (Doubles the prize money received after battle.)

Harden.desc: Boosts the user's Defense by one stage.

Head Charge.desc: User takes one quarter of damage dealt in recoil.

Head Smash.desc: User takes half of damage dealt in recoil.

Headbutt.desc: 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Heal Bell.desc: Cures status on the user's team.

Heal Block.desc: Prevents the foes from using healing moves for 5 turns.

Heal Pulse.desc: Heals the target by 50 its max HP.

Healing Wish.desc: KOes the user and heals the next Pokemon in.

Heart Stamp.desc: 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Heart Swap.desc: Swaps the user's and the target's stat boosts and drops.

Heat Crash.desc: Deals more damage the heavier the user is compared to the target.

Heavy Slam.desc: Deals more damage the heavier the user is compared to the target.

Helping Hand.desc: Increases power of an ally's subsequent move by 50. Priority +5.

Hex.desc: Base Power doubles if target has a status ailment.

Hidden Power Bug.desc: Type is based on the user's IVs.

Hidden Power Dark.desc: Type is based on the user's IVs.

Hidden Power Dragon.desc: Type is based on the user's IVs.

Hidden Power Electric.desc: Type is based on the user's IVs.

Hidden Power Rock.desc: Type is based on the user's IVs.

Hidden Power Steel.desc: Type is based on the user's IVs.

Hidden Power Water.desc: Type is based on the user's IVs.

Hone Claws.desc: Boosts the user's Attack and accuracy by one stage.

Howl.desc: Boosts the user's Attack by one stage.

Hydro Vortex.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Hyper Fang.desc: 10 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Hyperspace Fury.desc: Ignores the effects of Protect, Detect, King's Shield, Spiky Shield, and Mat Block. Lowers the user's Defense by one stage.

Hyperspace Hole.desc: Ignores the effects of Protect, Detect, King's Shield, Spiky Shield, and Mat Block.

Ice Ball.desc: Power doubles with each use. Locks user in for 5 turns.

Ice Burn.desc: Hits the turn after being used. 30 chance to burn the target.

Ice Fang.desc: 10 chance of causing the target to flinch. 10 chance to freeze.

Icicle Crash.desc: 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Icy Wind.desc: Lowers foes' Speed by one stage.

Imprison.desc: No foe can use any of the user's moves.

Inferno Overdrive.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Infestation.desc: Traps and damages target for 4-5 turns.

Ingrain.desc: Heals the user by 1/16 of its max HP each turn and prevents it from switching and being forced to switch.

Instruct.desc: The target immediately uses its last used move.

Ion Deluge.desc: Changes subsequent Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves. Priority +1.

Jump Kick.desc: If attack misses or fails, user loses half its max HP.

Kinesis.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

Laser Focus.desc: Next turn, the user's attack will be a critical hit.

Last Resort.desc: Can only be used if all other moves have been used at least once. Fails if the user's only move.

Leaf Storm.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.

Leaf Tornado.desc: 50 chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

Leer.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.

Light Screen.desc: Lowers the damage dealt by special attacks for 5 turns.

Light That Burns the Sky.desc: Physical if user's Atk > SpA. Ignores the target's Ability.

Light of Ruin.desc: User takes half of damage dealt in recoil.

Liquidation.desc: 20 chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Lock-On.desc: User's next move will always hit.

Low Kick.desc: Deals damage based on the foe's weight.

Low Sweep.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.

Lunar Dance.desc: KOes the user and heals the next Pokemon in.

Lunge.desc: 100 chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

Luster Purge.desc: 50 chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Magic Coat.desc: Bounces back certain non-damaging moves. Priority +4.

Magic Room.desc: Held items have no effect for 5 turns.

Magma Storm.desc: Traps and damages target for 4-5 turns.

Magnet Rise.desc: User becomes immune to Ground-type moves for 5 turns.

Magnetic Flux.desc: Raises the Defense and Special Defense stats of ally Pokemon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

Mat Block.desc: The user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. Only works first turn out.

Me First.desc: Uses the foe's attack at 1.5x power. User must be faster for move to work.

Meditate.desc: Boosts the user's Attack by one stage.

Memento.desc: User faints. Lowers the foe's Attack and Special Attack by two stages.

Metal Burst.desc: Counters foe's attack with 1.5x damage, but user must go last.

Metal Claw.desc: 10 chance to boost the user's Attack by one stage.

Metal Sound.desc: Lowers the target's Special Defense by two stages.

Meteor Mash.desc: 20 chance to raise the user's Attack by one stage.

Milk Drink.desc: Heals 50 of the user's max HP.

Mimic.desc: Copies the last move used by the target.

Mind Blown.desc: User loses 50 max HP. Hits adjacent Pokemon.

Mind Reader.desc: The user's next move will always hit.

Minimize.desc: Boosts the user's evasion by two stages.

Miracle Eye.desc: Nullifies evasion boosts. Allows Psychic-type moves to hit Dark-types.

Mirror Move.desc: Uses the last move that hit the user.

Mirror Shot.desc: 30 chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

Mist.desc: Prevents moves that only lower stats from working for 5 turns.

Mist Ball.desc: 50 chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.

Misty Terrain.desc: Grounded Pokemon immune to status and Dragon-type moves weakened

Moonblast.desc: 30 chance to lower the target's Special Attack by one stage.

Moongeist Beam.desc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

Moonlight.desc: Heals variably depending on the weather.

Morning Sun.desc: Heals variably depending on the weather.

Mud Bomb.desc: 30 chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

Mud Shot.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.

Mud-Slap.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

Muddy Water.desc: 30 chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

Multi-Attack.desc: Type varies based on the held Memory.

Mystical Fire.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

Nasty Plot.desc: Boosts the user's Special Attack by two stages.

Natural Gift.desc: Power and type depend on the user's held Berry.

Nature's Madness.desc: Does damage equal to 1/2 target's current HP.

Needle Arm.desc: 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Never-Ending Nightmare.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Night Daze.desc: 40 chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

Night Shade.desc: Deals damage equal to the user's level.

Night Slash.desc: Has a high critical hit rate.

Nightmare.desc: Deals 1/4 of a sleeping target's max HP per turn.

Noble Roar.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by one stage. Priority -1.

Octazooka.desc: 50 chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

Odor Sleuth.desc: Blocks evasion modifiers. Allows Fighting- and Normal-type moves to hit Ghosts.

Ominous Wind.desc: 10 chance to boost all of the user's stats by one stage.

Outrage.desc: Repeats for two to three turns. Confuses user at the end.

Overheat.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after use.

Pain Split.desc: Averages the user's and the target's HP.

Parabolic Charge.desc: Leeches 50 damage dealt to all targets.

Parting Shot.desc: Lowers the all adjacent foes' Attack and Special Attack by one stage, then the user switches out.

Payback.desc: Base Power doubles if the user moves after the target.

Perish Song.desc: All active Pokemon faint after three turns.

Petal Dance.desc: Repeats for two to three turns. Confuses the user at the end.

Phantom Force.desc: User becomes invulnerable, then attacks the next turn. Nullifies Detect and Protect.

Photon Geyser.desc: Physical if user's Atk > SpA. Ignores the target's ability.

Plasma Fists.desc: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves instead this turn.

Play Nice.desc: Lowers the target's Attack by one stage. Ignores Protect.

Play Rough.desc: 10 chance to lower the target's Attack stat by one stage.

Poison Fang.desc: 50 chance to badly poison the target.

Poison Tail.desc: High critical hit rate. 10 chance to poison the target.

Pollen Puff.desc: If the target is an ally, heals 50 of its max HP.

Powder.desc: Damages the target if it uses a Fire-type move. Priority +1.

Power Split.desc: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target, ignoring stat changes.

Power Swap.desc: Swaps Attack and Special Attack boosts and drops with the target.

Power Trick.desc: Swaps the user's Attack and Defense stats, not moving stat changes.

Power Trip.desc: + 20 power for each of the user's stat boosts.

Power-Up Punch.desc: Raises the user's Attack by one stage after attacking.

Present.desc: Has random power and a chance to heal the target. Breakneck Blitz Base Power: 100

Protect.desc: Prevents anything from working on the user that turn. Priority +4.

Psychic.desc: 10 chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Psychic Fangs.desc: Destroys screens, unless the target is immune.

Psycho Boost.desc: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.

Psycho Cut.desc: Has a high critical hit rate.

Psycho Shift.desc: Shifts the user's status effect to the foe.

Psyshock.desc: Damage is based on the target's Defense stat.

Psystrike.desc: Damage is based on the target's Defense stat.

Psywave.desc: Does random damage equal to .5x-1.5x the user's level.

Punishment.desc: Varies in power depending on the number of stat boosts accumulated by the target.

Purify.desc: Cures target's status; heals user 1/2 maxHP if so.

Pursuit.desc: Doubles in power and hits before the switch if the target switches. If the target switches, Priority +7. Otherwise, Priority +0.

Quash.desc: Forces the target to move last.

Quick Guard.desc: Protects the user and its allies from all priority attacks, barring Feint. If Quick Guard is broken by Feint, it will no longer protect the user or its allies from priority attacks. Quick Guard can be used consecutively without failing, but use of Quick Guard lowers the chances of Detect, Endure, King's Shield, Protect, and Spiky Shield succeeding for the proceding turn. Priority +3. Z-Effect: +1 Defense

Quiver Dance.desc: Boosts the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage.

Rage.desc: Boosts Attack by one stage if hit.

Rage Powder.desc: All subsequent moves target the user. Priority +2.

Rapid Spin.desc: Removes Leech Seed, partial trapping, and entry hazards if the user does not faint from subsequent recoil damage.

Razor Shell.desc: 50 chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

Razor Wind.desc: Charges first turn; attacks on the second. High critical hit rate.

Recover.desc: Heals 50 of the user's max HP.

Reflect.desc: Lowers the damage from physical attacks for 5 turns.

Reflect Type.desc: User becomes the same type as the target.

Relic Song.desc: 10 chance to put target to sleep. If used by Meloetta, causes it to change from Aria Forme to Pirouette Forme.

Rest.desc: The user goes to sleep for two turns, restoring all HP.

Retaliate.desc: Power doubles if the user's teammate fainted the previous turn.

Return.desc: Base Power increases proportionally to the user's happiness.

Revelation Dance.desc: Type varies based on the user's primary type.

Revenge.desc: Doubles in power if user was damaged. Priority -4.

Reversal.desc: Does more damage as the user's HP decreases.

Roar.desc: Forces a switch to a random Pokemon. Priority -6.

Rock Polish.desc: Boosts the user's Speed by two stages.

Rock Slide.desc: 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Rock Smash.desc: 50 chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

Rock Tomb.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by one stage.

Role Play.desc: Copies the foe's ability, overwriting the user's ability.

Rolling Kick.desc: 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Rollout.desc: Power doubles with each use. Locks user in for 5 turns.

Roost.desc: Heals 50 of the user's max HP. Temporarily removes the user's Flying type and turns it into a Normal-type if it is a pure Flying-type.

Rototiller.desc: Raises the Attack and Special Attack stats of all Grass-type Pokemon on the field by one stage.

Round.desc: Power doubles if a teammate uses Round in the same turn.

Sacred Fire.desc: 50 chance to burn the target. Thaws the user.

Safeguard.desc: Protects the user's team from status conditions for five turns.

Sand Attack.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

Sand Tomb.desc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

Sandstorm.desc: Summons a sandstorm for five turns.

Savage Spin-Out.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Scald.desc: 30 chance to burn the target. Thaws the user.

Scary Face.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages.

Screech.desc: Lowers the target's Defense by two stages.

Secret Sword.desc: Damage is based on the target's Defense stat.

Seed Flare.desc: 40 chance to lower the target's Special Defense by two stages.

Seismic Toss.desc: Deals damage equal to the user's level.

Shadow Ball.desc: 20 chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Shadow Bone.desc: 20 chance to lower the target's Defense by 1.

Shadow Force.desc: User becomes invulnerable, then attacks the next turn. Nullifies Detect and Protect.

Sharpen.desc: Boosts the user's Attack by one stage.

Shattered Psyche.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Sheer Cold.desc: OHKOes the target. Fails if the target is an Ice-type. If the user is not an Ice-type, the accuracy is lower.

Shell Smash.desc: Boosts the ser's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages each and lowers its Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

Shell Trap.desc: User must take physical damage before moving.

Shift Gear.desc: Boosts the users Speed by two stages and Attack by one stage.

Shore Up.desc: Heals the user by a weather-dependent amount.

Silver Wind.desc: 10 chance to boost all the user's stats by one stage.

Simple Beam.desc: Changes the target's ability to Simple.

Sketch.desc: Permanently copies the last move used by the target.

Skill Swap.desc: The user and the target trade abilities.

Skull Bash.desc: Charges and boosts the user's Defense by one stage turn one; attacks turn two.

Sky Attack.desc: Hits the turn after being used.

Sky Drop.desc: Hits the turn after being used. The target cannot move the turn the move is used.

Sky Uppercut.desc: Can hit a Bouncing, Flying, or Sky Dropping target.

Slack Off.desc: Heals 50 of the user's max HP.

Sleep Talk.desc: Uses one of the user's moves at random. Can only be used while sleeping.

Smack Down.desc: Hits Pokemon in the air and knocks them to the ground.

Smart Strike.desc: This move does not check accuracy.

Smelling Salts.desc: Base Power doubles if used on a paralyzed target but cures it of paralysis.

Smokescreen.desc: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

Snarl.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

Snatch.desc: If certain moves are used, the user of Snatch uses the moves instead. Priority +4.

Snore.desc: Fails if the user is awake. 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Soft-Boiled.desc: Heals 50 of the user's max HP.

Solar Blade.desc: Charges turn 1. Hits turn 2. No charge in sunlight.

Sparkling Aria.desc: The target is cured of its burn.

Spectral Thief.desc: Steals target's boosts before dealing damage.

Spikes.desc: Damages foes as they switch in.

Spiky Shield.desc: Prevents anything from working on the user that turn. Priority +4.

Spirit Shackle.desc: Prevents the target from switching out.

Spit Up.desc: Varies in power depending on the number of uses of Stockpile.

Spite.desc: Takes away 4 PP from the last move the target used.

Spotlight.desc: Moves redirect to the target on the turn used.

Stealth Rock.desc: Damages foes as they switch in.

Steamroller.desc: 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Steel Wing.desc: 10 chance to raise the user's Defense by one stage.

Sticky Web.desc: Lowers the foes' Speed by one stage as they switch in.

Stockpile.desc: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each. Fails if the user has already used Stockpile three times.

Stomp.desc: 30 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Stomping Tantrum.desc: Power doubles if the user's last move failed.

Stored Power.desc: Varies in power depending on the number of stat boosts accumulated by the user.

Storm Throw.desc: Always results in a critical hit.

Strength Sap.desc: User heals HP by target's Atk stat. Lowers target's Attack one stage.

String Shot.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by two stages. Hits all adjacent foes.

Struggle.desc: User takes half of damage dealt in recoil. Ghost-types take damage.

Struggle Bug.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.

Submission.desc: User takes a quarter of damage dealt in recoil.

Substitute.desc: Takes 1/4 the user's max HP to create a Substitute that takes damage for the user.

Subzero Slammer.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Sucker Punch.desc: Priority +1. Will only work if the foe chose a damaging move and moves after the user.

Sunsteel Strike.desc: Ignores the Abilities of other Pokemon.

Super Fang.desc: Deals damage equal to half the target's current HP.

Superpower.desc: Lowers the user's Attack and Defense by one stage each.

Supersonic Skystrike.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Swagger.desc: Confuses the target and boosts its Attack by two stages.

Swallow.desc: Healing varies based on the number of times the user has used Stockpile. Removes the user's Defense and Special Defense boosts gained through using Stockpile.

Sweet Scent.desc: Lowers the target's evasion by two stages. Hits all adjacent foes.

Switcheroo.desc: The user switches items with the target.

Swords Dance.desc: Boosts the user's Attack by two stages.

Synchronoise.desc: Only damages Pokemon of the same type as the user.

Synthesis.desc: Heals variably depending on the weather.

Tail Glow.desc: Boosts the user's Special Attack by three stages.

Tail Whip.desc: Lowers the Defense of all opposing adjacent Pokemon by one stage.

Tailwind.desc: Doubles the Speed of the user and its allies for four turns.

Take Down.desc: User takes a quarter of damage dealt in recoil.

Taunt.desc: The target cannot use status moves for three turns.

Tearful Look.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1.

Techno Blast.desc: Type will change depending on the user's held Drive.

Tectonic Rage.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Telekinesis.desc: Lasts for three turns and makes all moves hit the target. Makes the target immune to Ground.

Thousand Arrows.desc: Hits Pokemon in the air and knocks them to the ground.

Thrash.desc: Repeats for two to three turns. Confuses the user at the end.

Throat Chop.desc: For 2 turns, the target cannot use sound moves.

Thunder.desc: 30 chance to paralyze the target. Never misses in rain.

Thunder Fang.desc: 10 chance of causing the target to flinch. 10 chance to paralyze the target.

Tickle.desc: Lowers the target's Attack and Defense by one stage each.

Torment.desc: Prevents the target from using the same move twice in a row, except Struggle.

Toxic Spikes.desc: Poisons foes as they switch in.

Toxic Thread.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 1 and poisons it.

Transform.desc: Transforms the user into the target, copying its type, stats, stat changes, moves, and ability.

Tri Attack.desc: 20 chance to burn the target, freeze, or paralyze the target, with an equal chance for each.

Trick Room.desc: Slower Pokemon move first for five turns. Priority -7.

Trick-or-Treat.desc: Adds Ghost to the target's type(s). If the target already has three types, the third is replaced.

Trop Kick.desc: 100 chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.

Twineedle.desc: Hits twice. Each hit has a 20 chance to poison the target.

Twinkle Tackle.desc: Power is equal to the base move's Z-Power.

Twister.desc: 20 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Uproar.desc: Repeats for two to five turns. No Pokemon can sleep during these turns.

V-create.desc: Lowers the user's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

Venom Drench.desc: Lowers the Attack, Special Attack, and Speed of a poisoned target by one stage each.

Venoshock.desc: Base Power doubles when used on a poisoned target.

Vital Throw.desc: Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers. Priority -1.

Volt Tackle.desc: User takes a third of damage dealt in recoil.

Wake-Up Slap.desc: Base Power doubles if used on a sleeping target. If the target is sleeping, wakes it up.

Water Pledge.desc: Use with Fire Pledge or Grass Pledge for additional effects.

Water Shuriken.desc: Hits two to five times. Priority +1. If the user is Ash-Greninja, the Base Power is boosted to 20 and the move always hits three times.

Water Spout.desc: Does less damage as the user's HP decreases.

Waterfall.desc: 20 chance of causing the target to flinch.

Weather Ball.desc: Base Power doubles and changes type based on the weather.

Whirlpool.desc: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

Whirlwind.desc: Forces a switch to a random Pokemon. Priority -6.

Wide Guard.desc: Protects user and allies from multi-target attacks. Priority +3.

Wild Charge.desc: User takes a quarter of damage dealt in recoil.

Wish.desc: Heals 50 of the user's max HP after two turns. Can heal an ally in the user's place.

Withdraw.desc: Boosts the user's Defense by one stage.

Wonder Room.desc: Swaps the Defense and Special Defense of all Pokemon, ignoring stat changes.

Wood Hammer.desc: User takes a third of damage dealt in recoil.

Work Up.desc: Boosts the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

Worry Seed.desc: Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.

Wrap.desc: Deals damage to the target at the end of every turn for 4-5 turns.

Wring Out.desc: Base Power depends on the target's remaining HP.

Yawn.desc: Puts the target to sleep after two turns.

Zen Headbutt.desc: 20 chance of causing the target to flinch.
